text: @GavinNewsom There you have your answear, masks DO NOT work. Make #Hydroxychloroquine over the counter or at least advice to people to ask their Doctors about #HCQ. It has been proven that prevents and even defits Covid19. If you really care, be the much needed hope for the people.
